Articles.Content:
Hello community, I'm now working on an ornithopter and I find that using differential damping on the wing hinges could give me yaw control.
But I ran into a problem, the damping range goes from 0 to 200, but when I add damping to a KAL-1000 unit it only ranges from 0 to 1. This happens to every single part that haves the damping field.

Is this a game bug? Is there a way to fix it?
